mapper.select: select * from personal_info where id = #{ id } and pwd = #{ pw }
mapper.insert: insert into personal_info (id, pwd, name, phone_number, city, gu, dong, email) values(#{ id }, #{ pw }, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{email})
mapper.delete: delete from personal_info where cid = #{ cid }
